text: Hello. How can we hide arrows of a slider (Image gallery module)? I cannot change the style value with jquery (maybe Slick library is launched after my script)...
css? or make a custom image gallery module
It's impossible in css: the display value is in the html tag (probably adding by slick). What do you mean by "custom image gallery module"?

Does anyone know if there is a way to programmatically update the module label in the HubSpot designer based on parameter/field options.  I have a module with several configuration options and it would be nice when you edit the page and look at all of the modules to be able to update the label so that you can see how each module is configured at a glance.
this is an example of what i'm trying to update... i would like to update the module label with something like "SIP -SF3 Header (Option A)"
but have it change based on the dropdown configuration of that module
Good idea.  Also would be nice to be able to swap out the Module Icon
<@UNN47J3TQ> You can change the icon in custom modules by hovering over the icon and adding your own.
This isnt possible at the moment, but this is a really good idea. Would you mind posting this to the ideas forum over at: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/custom/page/page-id/ideaslandingpage>
If you do add it in, can you post a link back to the <#C26E7JT8V|ideas> channel as well? Thank you :slightly_smiling_face:
